channel.title: Dayfiles Blog

item.title: From Accra to Berlin: A Student Visa Application Story Powered by Dayfiles
item.description: A practical story of how one student preparing for studies in Germany used Dayfiles tools to organize documents, fix image assets, and submit a clean visa-ready application package.

item.title: PDF Toolkit Operations Checklist for Reliable Document Delivery
item.description: Use this checklist to standardize PDF conversion, compression, and delivery with fewer errors and faster approvals.

item.title: Everyday Image Studio Workflow Playbook for Daily Creative Operations
item.description: A practical guide for teams that need faster image turnaround, consistent quality, and cleaner handoffs using Everyday Image Studio.
